thread.title: BRIEF-Perkinelmer Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.97 From Continuing Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Perkinelmer Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.97 From Continuing Operations
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Perkinelmer Inc:
* PERKINELMER ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.97 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.35 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.50 * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.28 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.94 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
